attributes.action: to grant full British Citizenship to stateless British Overseas Citizens (B.O.C)  in limbo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is believed that there are some five hundred stateless B.O.C passport holders in limbo in the UK. This petition has been written to ask the UK government to grant full British Citizenship to B.O.C from Penang and Malacca who are stateless, both in and outside the UK. We also urge the UK government to take appropriate measures to prevent a similar disaster from happening in the future.
